Title: Sliver Vulnerable to Pre-Auth Memory Exhaustion via NoEncoder Bypass
Description: A specially crafted nonce routes unauthenticated requests through the NoEncoder path, where `startSessionHandler()` reads the entire request body without limits, allowing attacker-driven memory exhaustion and process crash.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.5.0 up to 1.5.44
Solution: Unfortunately, there is no solution available yet.
